subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Basic sprinkler and wall wetting systems protecting a building containing an atrium must be provided with easily accessible and identified stop valves.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Sprinkler and wall wetting systems must be provided with independent stop valves.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Sprinkler heads protecting the roof of the atrium must be provided with a stop valve.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Stop valves to wall wetting and roof sprinklers may be of the gate type.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: All sprinkler and wall wetting stop valves must be monitored to detect unauthorised closure.
